testsuite.name: space.WorldTest

testcase.name: Spawning creature attachs it to slot
KingSight does not includes slots out of bounds
random Edge slot yields a random edge slot
World is Full if creatures are on more than 95% of slots
Should Retrieve all slots in the world
Cross Sight Works in World Corner
Chance to put down food when quantity requested not yet reached - false case
Disallow putting down food when requested quantity below zero
Chance to put down food when quantity requested not yet reached - true case
An index is not edge if index != worldEnd && index != 0
An index is edge if index == 0
Should Retrieve all food slots in the world - no food in the world
Gives slots with creatures in them - no creatures
Count remaining creatures returns creatures list size
Edge slots have an X index of 0 and Y at worldEnd or vice versa
Disallow putting down food when requested quantity is zero
Empty creatures list means all creatures are dead - dead world
Should Count Food In the world - has one food
Killing creature removes it from list
Should Retrieve all food slots in the world
Should Count Food In the world empty
An index is edge if index == worldEnd
KingSight grants vision of all surrounding slots to a creature
